item.description:
Ladies, this movie comes out on June 29th and I've gotta say that the write-up on it has me counting the days to see it. What better movie for a bunch of fun girls to get together and go out to see??

Just in case you haven't heard - Magic Mike is an upcoming comedy film directed by Steven Soderbergh starring Channing Tatum, Alex Pettyfer, Matthew McConaughey, Cody Horn, Joe Manganiello, and Matt Bomer.

McConaughey says that filming the dance scene was addictive.
"At first it was scary as hell, but then it became like a drug, and I couldn’t wait to do it again," he said. "Look, I love to dance, but I’ve never been a stripper. Channing’s one of the best hip-hop street dancers I’ve ever seen, and I didn’t want to challenge his style, so I worked on my own strengths. I also knew that my dance had to be the dirtiest. It had to be wonderfully filthy."

 

....and it just makes sense to go out dancing afterwards! Probably Piper Beau's at 207 Main Street, Wareham since it's close by and the band Chain Drive is playing.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Girl's Night Out to see Magic Mike Movie
